amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Edward Byrne Memorial Justice Assistance Grant program by $2 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for Justice Assistance Grants by $2,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Garrett (NJ).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
